item.description:
We tried this in February but the weather did not cooperate so after careful planning with the tide schedule, I'm going to try again.
Let's head back over to Fort Foster (actually this will be my first time there) then to Warren's Lobster House.

Carpooling from Manchester:
Anyone wanting to carpool from Manchester we will meet at 1:00 pm at the Youngsville Park which is just off Candia Road.

Youngsville Park
1934 Candia Road
Manchester, NH
http://www.meetup.com...

Here is the tide schedule for Sunday March 22nd

High Tide
8:46 am
9:22 pm

Low Tide
2:39 am
3:18 pm

We will have some fun with the dogs on the beach and along the trails for about an hour or so and then head over to
Warren's Lobster House for a late lunch/early dinner.

Here is a link to their website so you can check out their menu which is huge !

http://www.lobsterhou...

And they also have great desserts which is a big plus on my list !!

Hope you can join us.
item.how_to_find_us: You will likely hear Plunk Screaming - Hey.....Over Here......Over Here !!!

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: A Day at the Beach (Fort Foster) and a Bite to Eat at Warren's Lobster House
